title: Veteran Career Services Fund
description: To provide general support for the Boots to Suits Program, including, but not limited to, providing suits to student veterans who are part of the Boots to Suits Program at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.
marketingContent: To provide general support for the Boots to Suits Program at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.  Support includes, but is not limited to, providing suits to student veterans who are part of the Boots to Suits Program.
